Â function normal_calculation(accArr, noteArr) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let score1 = accArr[0]
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let temp1 = (noteArr[0] + noteArr[1]) * accArr[1] - noteArr[0] * accArr[0]
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let score2 = temp1 / (noteArr[1])
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let temp2 = (noteArr[0] + noteArr[1] + noteArr[2]) * accArr[2] - (noteArr[0] + noteArr[1]) * accArr[1]
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let score3 = temp2 / (noteArr[2])
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let temp3 = (noteArr[0] + noteArr[1] + noteArr[2] + noteArr[3]) * accArr[3] - (noteArr[0] + noteArr[1] + noteArr[2]) * accArr[2]
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  let score4 = temp3 / (noteArr[3])
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return [score1, score2, score3, score4]
Â  Â  Â  Â  }

        return NULL;
    }

    double song1_acc, song2_acc, song3_acc, song4_acc;

    // ç¬¬ä¸€é¦–æ­Œï¼šç›´æ¥å–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¯ç§¯å¹³å‡å€¼
    result[0] = player_acc[0];

    // ç¬¬äºŒé¦–æ­Œï¼š((n0 + n1)*a1 - n0*a0) / n1
    double sum2 = total_keys[0] + total_keys[1];
    result[1] = (sum2 * player_acc[1] - total_keys[0] * player_acc[0]) / total_keys[1];

    // ç¬¬ä¸‰é¦–æ­Œï¼š((n0 + n1 + n2)*a2 - (n0 + n1)*a1) / n2
    double sum3 = sum2 + total_keys[2];
    result[2] = (sum3 * player_acc[2] - sum2 * player_acc[1]) / total_keys[2];

    // ç¬¬å››é¦–æ­Œï¼š((n0 + n1 + n2 + n3)*a3 - (n0 + n1 + n2)*a2) / n3
    double sum4 = sum3 + total_keys[3];
    result[3] = (sum4 * player_acc[3] - sum3 * player_acc[2]) / total_keys[3];

    return result;
}
